name: DollarDash | "Dollar" Theme GameJam
description:
DollarDash

The game is submission for a Game Jam hosted by a university Game Development course, with the theme of Dollar.

Time is Money

Delivering packages gives you less money but the potential to earn more time and eventually more money. On the other hand, while stealing packages earns you double the money and quickly, sometimes a million dollars in the future is better than 10k right now, think big.
